Posts.Content: mimi73 wrote: so i'm new as of today. i have been battling breast cancer for 4 years. i recently was diagnosed with metastatic bone cancer and i'm 35 years old. so my question is what kind of treatments are people doing and how do you keep going because i don't want to die any time soon!!  Log in to post a reply
